get.description: Health check endpoint for ACA liveness/readiness probes.

Get frontend runtime configuration.

This endpoint exposes backend configuration to the frontend,
allowing runtime configuration without rebuilding the frontend.

Returns:
    FrontendConfig: Configuration values for frontend validation behavior

post.description:
Bulk import ground truth items.

Behavior:
- ID field: Each item may include 'id' (alias 'uuid'); missing/blank values are generated server-side using
  randomname to produce a two-word, hyphenated string (e.g., 'sleek-voxel').
- Order preservation: Response `uuids` mirrors request order for easy correlation.
- Duplicate handling: Existing items are not overwritten; per-item errors are returned in `errors`.
- Optional approval: `approve=true` marks all items approved and sets review metadata.
- Size limit: Requests exceeding BULK_IMPORT_MAX_ITEMS return HTTP 413.

parameters.name: approve

schema.description: If true, mark all imported items as approved and set review metadata.
schema.title: Approve

parameters.description: If true, mark all imported items as approved and set review metadata.

parameters.name: excludeTags

schema.description: Comma-separated list of tags to exclude (items with ANY excluded tag will be filtered out)
schema.title: Excludetags

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to exclude (items with ANY excluded tag will be filtered out)

parameters.name: itemId

schema.description: Search for items by ID (case-sensitive partial match)
schema.title: Itemid

parameters.description: Search for items by ID (case-sensitive partial match)

parameters.name: refUrl

schema.description: Search for items by reference URL (case-sensitive partial match)
schema.title: Refurl

parameters.description: Search for items by reference URL (case-sensitive partial match)

parameters.name: keyword

schema.description: Search for items by keyword (case-insensitive text search across questions, answers, and history)
schema.title: Keyword

parameters.description: Search for items by keyword (case-insensitive text search across questions, answers, and history)

get.description:
Return approved items as a downloadable JSON attachment.

Response headers include Content-Disposition so browsers download the file.

Response Delete Item V1 Ground Truths  Datasetname   Bucket   Item Id  Delete

post.description:
Recompute computed tags for all matching ground truth items.

This endpoint recalculates the `computedTags` field for all items matching
the optional filter criteria. Use this when:
- A new computed tag plugin has been added
- An existing plugin's logic has been modified
- Data needs to be reprocessed after a bug fix

The operation is idempotent - running it multiple times with the same
data produces the same result.

**Important**: By default, `dry_run=true` for safety. Set `dry_run=false`
to actually persist changes.

parameters.name: dataset

schema.description: Filter to items in a specific dataset. If not provided, processes all datasets.
schema.title: Dataset

parameters.description: Filter to items in a specific dataset. If not provided, processes all datasets.

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter to items with a specific status (draft, approved, etc.).
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Filter to items with a specific status (draft, approved, etc.).

parameters.name: dry_run

schema.description: If true, preview changes without persisting. Defaults to true for safety.
schema.title: Dry Run

parameters.description: If true, preview changes without persisting. Defaults to true for safety.

schema.title: Response List My Assignments V1 Assignments My Get

post.description:
Assign a specific ground truth item to the current user.

This endpoint:
- Assigns the item to the current user
- Sets the item status to draft (even if previously approved/deleted/skipped)
- Creates an assignment document in the assignments container
- Returns the updated ground truth item

With force=true:
- Requires admin or team-lead role
- Allows taking over items assigned to other users
- Cleans up the previous user's assignment document
Duplicate an existing item as a draft rephrase, assign to caller, and return the new item.

get.description:
List available component schema names from the OpenAPI document.

Compatibility behavior:
- Returns a list where the first segment contains objects with `name` and `title`
    (for newer clients/tests that expect objects), followed by the plain string names
    (to preserve backward-compatibility with older callers/tests).

schema.title: Response List Schemas V1 Schemas Get

get.description: Return a specific component schema by name from the OpenAPI document.

schema.title: Response Get Schema V1 Schemas  Name  Get

force.title: Force
force.description: Force assignment even if item is assigned to another user (requires admin or team-lead role)

AssignmentUpdateRequest.title: AssignmentUpdateRequest
AssignmentUpdateRequest.description:
Payload for SME update (save draft / approve / skip / delete).

Using a Pydantic model allows camelCase -> snake_case alias handling. All fields optional; we
only mutate those explicitly provided (tracked via model_fields_set).

itemId.title: Itemid
itemId.description: ID of the failed item (if available)

field.title: Field
field.description: Field that caused the error (if applicable)

code.title: Code
code.description: Error code: INVALID_TAG, DUPLICATE_ID, CREATE_FAILED, etc.

BulkImportError.title: BulkImportError
BulkImportError.description: Structured error for bulk import failures.

DatasetCurationInstructions.title: DatasetCurationInstructions
DatasetCurationInstructions.description:
Dataset-level curation instructions document (schemaVersion v1).

Stored in the same Cosmos container as ground-truth items using MultiHash PK
[/datasetName, /bucket] with bucket fixed to 0 and a stable id pattern
"curation-instructions|{datasetName}".

duplicateId.title: Duplicateid
duplicateId.description: ID of the likely duplicate approved item

duplicateQuestion.title: Duplicatequestion
duplicateQuestion.description: Question text from the duplicate item

matchReason.title: Matchreason
matchReason.description: Why this was flagged as a duplicate (e.g., 'exact question match', 'question and answer match')

DuplicateWarning.title: DuplicateWarning
DuplicateWarning.description: Warning about a likely duplicate of an approved item.

ExpectedBehavior.title: ExpectedBehavior
ExpectedBehavior.description:
Expected behavior tags for history items in ground truth evaluation.

These tags describe what the agent should do at each turn of a conversation:
- tool:search: Agent should perform a search/retrieval operation
- generation:answer: Agent should generate a direct answer
- generation:need-context: Agent should ask for more context
- generation:clarification: Agent should ask for clarification
- generation:out-of-domain: Agent should indicate the query is out of domain

GroundTruthItem-Input.title: GroundTruthItem
GroundTruthItem-Input.description:
Canonical Ground Truth item aligned to wire schema (schemaVersion v1).

All fields with camelCase wire names use aliases; we accept both field names and aliases
on input (populate_by_name=True) and always serialize using by_alias.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Return a merged, sorted view of manual and computed tags.

GroundTruthItem-Output.title: GroundTruthItem
GroundTruthItem-Output.description:
Canonical Ground Truth item aligned to wire schema (schemaVersion v1).

All fields with camelCase wire names use aliases; we accept both field names and aliases
on input (populate_by_name=True) and always serialize using by_alias.

expectedBehavior.title: Expectedbehavior
expectedBehavior.description: Expected behavior(s) for this turn in the conversation (e.g., tool:search, generation:answer)

HistoryItem.title: HistoryItem
HistoryItem.description: Represents a single item in the multi-turn history.

failed.title: Failed
failed.description: Number of items that failed to import.

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: Structured error objects for items that failed to import.

uuids.title: Uuids
uuids.description: The item IDs in the same order as the request payload. Clients may send either 'id' or 'uuid' in each item; when missing or blank, the server generates a two-word, hyphenated string ID (e.g., 'sleek-voxel') via randomname.

piiWarnings.title: Piiwarnings
piiWarnings.description: Warnings about potential personally identifiable information (PII) detected in imported items. These are informational only and do not block import. Review flagged content for remediation.

duplicateWarnings.title: Duplicatewarnings
duplicateWarnings.description: Warnings about draft items that appear to be duplicates of approved items. These are informational only and do not block import. Review for potential duplicates.

validationSummary.description: Summary statistics for the bulk import operation.

field.title: Field
field.description: Field name where PII was detected (e.g., 'synthQuestion', 'history[2].msg')

snippet.title: Snippet
snippet.description: Masked context snippet showing the detected PII

position.title: Position
position.description: Character position where the PII was found

PIIWarning.title: PIIWarning
PIIWarning.description: Warning about potential PII detected in a ground truth item.

total.title: Total
total.description: Total number of items matching filters

hasNext.title: Hasnext
hasNext.description: Whether there is a next page

hasPrev.title: Hasprev
hasPrev.description: Whether there is a previous page

total.title: Total
total.description: Total items matching the filter criteria.

updated.title: Updated
updated.description: Number of items with changed computed tags.

skipped.title: Skipped
skipped.description: Number of items with unchanged computed tags.

dry_run.title: Dry Run
dry_run.description: Whether this was a dry run (no changes persisted).

RecomputeTagsResponse.title: RecomputeTagsResponse
RecomputeTagsResponse.description: Response for bulk computed tag recomputation.

Reference.title: Reference

Wire reference object.

{ url, title, content, keyExcerpt, type, bonus, messageIndex }
